an5.37:1.1: “Bhojanam, bhikkhave, dadamano dayako patiggahakanam panca thanani deti.
an5.37:1.3: Ayum deti, vannam deti, sukham deti, balam deti, patibhanam deti.
an5.37:1.4: Ayum kho pana datva ayussa bhagi hoti dibbassa va manusassa va;
an5.37:1.5: vannam datva vannassa bhagi hoti dibbassa va manusassa va;
an5.37:1.6: sukham datva sukhassa bhagi hoti dibbassa va manusassa va;
an5.37:1.7: balam datva balassa bhagi hoti dibbassa va manusassa va;
an5.37:1.8: patibhanam datva patibhanassa bhagi hoti dibbassa va manusassa va.
an5.37:1.9: Bhojanam, bhikkhave, dadamano dayako patiggahakanam imani panca thanani detiti.
